chetichand2025.message:
🚩 Om Satnam Sakhi | Jai Jhulelal 🚩

🛕 Shri Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur 🛕

**March 30, 2025 (Sunday) - Cheti Chand / Hindu New Year / New Samvatsar 2082**

Hindu Chaitra Shukla Pratipada Vikram Samvat 2082 (March 30, 2025), Sunday, marks the beginning of the Hindu New Year and Cheti Chand! On this auspicious day, be sure to observe these traditions:

🦺 Wear yellow or saffron-colored clothes

Apply a tilak 🔶 on your forehead

Prepare sweets and sweet rice at home

🚩 Hoist a saffron flag (Dhwaj) on your rooftop 🚩

At night, light 5-7 🪔🪔🪔🪔🪔 diyas at home and outside

Decorate your doorway with flower garlands and create rangoli

🍃🌷🌻🌹🌸🌾 Adorn your entrance with flower and leaf torans !!!

Wishing all Sanatanis a very Happy Indian Hindu New Year and Cheti Chand 🌙. Heartfelt congratulations and best wishes to all!

🙋‍♂️🔆🚩 Let us all greet and congratulate each other on Hindu New Year, New Samvatsar 2082, and Cheti Chand! 🙋‍♂️🔆🚩

🏡 Shri Amrapur Asthan, Jaipur

mataKrishnaDeviUdhyan.message:
🕉️ ॐ Satnam Sakshi 🕉️

Under the divine guidance of Shri Prem Prakash Mandalacharya
Satguru Swami Teoonram Ji Maharaj

**Grand Inauguration of Newly Constructed Mata Krishna Udhyan**

📅 **Monday, April 14, 2025, at 5:00 PM**

In the sacred memory of the revered and compassionate Mata Krishna Ji, a grand and beautiful Mata Krishna Udhyan has been constructed on the holy banks of Maa Ganga by Prem Prakash Mandal in the Bhupatwala region of Haridwar.

The inauguration will take place on Monday, April 14, 2025, at 5:00 PM

The event will be graced by the auspicious presence of Honorable **Shri Om Birla Ji, Speaker of the Lok Sabha, Government of India**, who will perform the inauguration ceremony, under the esteemed leadership of **Prem Prakash Mandalacharya Satguru Swami Bhagat Prakash Ji Maharaj**.

In Service:
🔹 **Shri Prem Prakash Mandal Trust**
📍 Shri Amarapur Sthan, Jaipur
📞 Phone: 0141-2372423, 24

Address:

📍 Bhupatwala, Haridwar - 249710
